Notes: Mix Bombay, Patron, Bacardi, Grey Goose and Cointreau in equal amounts. Dissolve 3/4 cups of Franks Lemon Bar Mix in water. In a mason jar, pack with ice, add 3 oz of alcoholic mixture, add 2.5 oz of coca-cola, 1 oz of lemon juice, 4 oz of Franco's mixture. Enjoy
In a mason jar packed with ice, add 3 oz of bombay sapphire gin, add 1 whole lemon squeezed juices, add 1.5 oz of simple syrup, top off mason jar with club soda.
